FuncDef: This command configures per-link-hashing on a LAG. When enabled, SAPs/subscribers/interfaces are hashed on LAG egress to a single LAG link.

ParaDef.Info: SAPs/subscribers/interfaces are distributed amongst LAG links based on their preconfigured class and weight. As new links are added to a LAG, existing SAPs/subscribers/interfaces are not impacted.

SAPs/subscribers/interfaces are distributed amongst LAG links based on their preconfigured class and weight. As new links are added to a LAG, existing SAPs/subscribers/interfaces are rebalanced automatically.
